feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 08:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
